28500.name: Drowned Reliquary - Sunken Antechamber
28500.description:
Bubbles rise in slow chains over broken statuary. strands of kelp sway like
curtains. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the temple as it
settles in the deep.

south.description: Silted steps descend to the south.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

west.description: A spiraling trench leads back toward the Sunken Temple.

zone_mechanic.message: Your lungs burn as the deep presses in around you!

28501.name: Hall of Salted Echoes
28501.description:
Schools of pale fish drift by over coral-laced pillars. a pressure hum fills
your skull. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the temple as it
settles in the deep.

south.description: Silted steps descend to the south.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

28502.name: Barnacle Gallery
28502.description:
Coral filigree crowns the stonework over pearl-inlaid glyphs. a hymn seems to
echo in the deep. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the temple
as it settles in the deep.

south.description: Silted steps descend to the south.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

28503.name: Silted Processional
28503.description:
The current tugs at your cloak over pearl-inlaid glyphs. drowned candles
gutter with blue flame. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the
temple as it settles in the deep.

south.description: Silted steps descend to the south.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

north.description: An aisle of drowned stone leads north.

south.description: Silted steps descend to the south.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

28528.name: Chasm of the Lost
28528.description:
Bubbles rise in slow chains over broken statuary. a hymn seems to echo in the
deep. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the temple as it settles
in the deep.

north.description: An aisle of drowned stone leads north.

south.description: Cold currents flow south through the spire.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

28529.name: Deepwater Transept
28529.description:
Schools of pale fish drift by over broken statuary. the water smells faintly
of incense. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the temple as it
settles in the deep.

north.description: An aisle of drowned stone leads north.

south.description: A heavy pressure draws you toward the sepulcher to the south.

28530.name: The Salt Priory
28530.description:
Faint blue light pulses from runes over algae-darkened tiles. ghostly bells
ring without source. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the
temple as it settles in the deep.

north.description: An aisle of drowned stone leads north.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

28531.name: Reliquary Crossroads
28531.description:
Faint blue light pulses from runes over cracked marble. shadows gather in the
corners. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the temple as it
settles in the deep.

north.description: An aisle of drowned stone leads north.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

28532.name: Warden's Threshold
28532.description:
Barnacles crust the ancient walls over sea-polished stone. a current circles
like a watchful eye. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the
temple as it settles in the deep.

north.description: An aisle of drowned stone leads north.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

28533.name: Lichgate Approach
28533.description:
Schools of pale fish drift by over gilded mosaics. drowned candles gutter with
blue flame. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the temple as it
settles in the deep.

north.description: An aisle of drowned stone leads north.

east.description: A flooded passage opens to the east.

28534.name: Reliquary Throne
28534.description:
Coral filigree crowns the stonework over broken statuary. ghostly bells ring
without source. The silence is broken only by the slow creak of the temple as
it settles in the deep.

north.description: The reliquary spire rises back north.

east.description: A gate of chained coral bars the way east.

28535.name: Thalassine Sepulcher
28535.description:
Silt curls into the water with each step over algae-darkened tiles. drowned
candles gutter with blue flame. The silence is broken only by the slow creak
of the temple as it settles in the deep.

north.description: The reliquary hall ascends toward the drowned nave.

west.description: The spire offers a retreat westward.

east.description: A bone-lined fissure yawns to the east, devouring the light.

28501.name: drowned acolyte
28501.long_desc: A drowned acolyte drifts in prayer, eyes hollow.
28501.description: This priest's vestments billow like seaweed, and his lips move in a silent litany.

28502.name: barnacle knight
28502.long_desc: A barnacle knight stands guard, armor fused with coral.
28502.description: A once-holy guardian, now crusted with barnacles and wielding a rusted halberd.

28503.name: reliquary guardian
28503.long_desc: A reliquary guardian glides forward, trident poised.
28503.description: Bronze plates fused to its frame bear the crest of the old sea-priesthood.

28504.name: coral revenant
28504.long_desc: A coral revenant claws its way from the silt.
28504.description: A drowned corpse entombed in coral, it lashes out with encrusted claws.

28505.name: tideworn assassin
28505.long_desc: A tideworn assassin slips through the water, blade low.
28505.description: This assassin's skin is scaled and slick, and his eyes never blink.

28506.name: abyssal cantor
28506.long_desc: An abyssal cantor sings a note that twists the water around you.
28506.description: Clad in kelp-robes, the cantor's voice reverberates in your bones.

28507.name: drowned herald
28507.long_desc: A drowned herald drifts forward, carrying a broken banner.
28507.description: Once the temple's announcer, it now proclaims ruin in a voice of bubbles.

28508.name: silted behemoth
28508.long_desc: A silted behemoth lumbers here, dragging broken chains.
28508.description: This giant's body is wrapped in rusted chains and draped with kelp.

28509.name: saltbound warden
28509.long_desc: A saltbound warden watches in silence, spear leveled.
28509.description: Ancient armor fitted with coral plates encases this relentless guard.

28510.name: reliquary abbot
28510.long_desc: The Reliquary Abbot glides forward, crozier raised.
28510.description: Once the keeper of the temple's greatest relics, he now guards them in death.

28511.name: drowned sanctifier
28511.long_desc: The Drowned Sanctifier raises a coral-tipped staff, water swirling.
28511.description: This drowned priest channels the deep, its eyes glowing with abyssal light.

28520.name: thalassine lich
28520.long_desc: The Thalassine Lich rises from its throne, eyes burning cold blue.
28520.description: A skeletal monarch draped in seaweed and gold, its crown held together by spectral force.

28550.name: Tideworn Mace
28550.room_desc: A mace of coral and brass lies here, dripping seawater.

28551.name: Reliquary Scepter
28551.room_desc: A scepter capped with a pearl relic rests here.

28552.name: Abyssal Mantle
28552.room_desc: A mantle of deep-blue silk floats weightlessly here.

28553.name: Barnacle-etched Greaves
28553.room_desc: Heavy greaves etched with barnacles rest on the stone.

28554.name: Coral-thread Cloak
28554.room_desc: A cloak woven with coral threads drifts here.

28555.name: Siltshadow Stiletto
28555.room_desc: A thin stiletto of dark steel lies half-buried in silt.

28556.name: Hymnkeeper's Chord
28556.room_desc: A stringed relic hums with a low, watery tone.

28557.name: Drowned Soulstone
28557.room_desc: A dark soulstone pulses with trapped bubbles of light.

28558.name: Lichwarden Staff
28558.room_desc: A staff topped with a drowned skull lies here, cold to the touch.
